result.title: Multispecies SNP array as a common genotyping tool for breeding
result.description: Commercially/openly available multispecific genotyping tool based on existing arrays and existing and de novo sequencing resources, with the validation of a first round of typing for the project’s case studies, as an opportunity to bring investment savings to breeding programs and pan-European collaboration.
